r.s: An extension to create PostScript files
r.d: ps is an extension similar to the pdf extension but for creating PostScript files. Its api is modelled after the pdf extension.
r.n: Added new function ps_string_geometry(), ps_set_text_pos(), ps_symbol(), ps_symbol_name(), ps_symbol_width(), ps_begin_pattern(), ps_end_pattern(), ps_begin_template(), ps_end_template().
